We Are the Flesh

Ano: 2016

IMDb ID: tt4682708

Classificação: 4.7

Sinopse: This movie was wild. Its basically a crazy man that forces these 2 siblings to do very perverted things to each other and him. They become extremely lewd, and extremely inconsistent. There is no morals in this. Its a very disgusting incestuous movie with no plot, problems or purpose. In the beginning we meet a nameless man who appears to have been isolated for some time now, in this abandoned building smashing things and having a tantrum of sorts. He beats his drum and screams wildly for about 5 minutes of the movie. When he finishes and passes out into a very deep sleep, these two siblings arrive and hang around until he wakes up. He allow as them to stay if they help him with his duct tape cave and do as he says. The man and the girl make a strange bond and begin thinking the same ways, becoming more perverted and loose of thought. Towards the middle of the film, both the man and the girl try to convince her brother that they should be lovers instead. After a failed kiss, she gets assistance from the crazed man who makes the boy stand there and his sister performs fallacious acts on him. Surviving on eggs and meat they decide to go out and bring new people back in. What they ever intended for them they do without hesitation. To wrap this all up, this movie is filled with nudity, random sex and cuts to genitalia, murder, and confusing unhinged moments not for the weak-hearted. I would not recommend watching this movie with family, especially children due to the pornographic manner this movie eventually takes on. This film is for mature audiences only. This is the opinion of the author and not the website itself.
